query: SELECT tipo, COUNT(*) as qtd, GROUP_CONCAT(id) as ids FROM fatoresRisco WHERE gestanteId = 42 GROUP BY tipo;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3v7At4WPQpm4aRf.9e6a8ae0e28e --database bSA4q7aMJsJeSmafooCq7A --execute SELECT tipo, COUNT(*) as qtd, GROUP_CONCAT(id) as ids FROM fatoresRisco WHERE gestanteId = 42 GROUP BY tipo;
